bilingual.source: Indirect investment is usually more flexible than direct investment.
bilingual.target: 间接投资通常比直接投资更灵活。

bilingual.source: Risk investment is a high-risk, high-reward investment method.
bilingual.target: 风险投资是一种高风险高回报的投资方式。

bilingual.source: The fruits of the investment can be reinvested.
bilingual.target: 投资的孳息可以用来再投资。
投资者称赞她有先见之明的投资选择。

bilingual.source: Bond investment is a relatively stable way to invest.
bilingual.target: 债券投资是一种相对稳定的投资方式。

bilingual.source: The investors were defrauded by a fake investment scheme.
bilingual.target: 投资者被一个虚假的投资计划欺诈了。

yingyinNormal.en: It just seems like a risky investment. I get that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这投资感觉风险挺大。我明白。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll do the $90,000 investment. At a $300,000 valuation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们接受你的90000美元投资，但我们的估值是300000美元。

yingyinNormal.en: Your profit on a mere $6,000 investment would be upwards of $60,000!
yingyinNormal.zh: 您只需投资6千块就可以收获6万。

yingyinNormal.en: Joey, I think you should consider something a little less risky. I mean, I think in this market, real estate is your best investment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你应该考虑比较低风险性的投资，我认为房地产会是最好的投资。

yingyinNormal.en: So, me and the guys were talking about this great investment opportunity. Nope.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我和小伙伴们在讨论这个绝佳的投资机会。不行。

yingyinNormal.en: Which would be the first of its kind. Open the gateway for increased investment...
yingyinNormal.zh: 这也是业内首家，放开了增加投资的渠道...

yingyinNormal.en: And we can transform an original $10 million investment into billions of dollars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以把原始的1000万美元投资变成几亿美元。

yingyinNormal.en: It's only a matter of time before someone else sees this investment. We have to act now!
yingyinNormal.zh: 其他人发现这个投资机会只是时间问题，我们现在就需要行动。

yingyinNormal.en: So how much are we talking about here? What, the investment? That's what you came here for.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么我们谈的是多大的生意呢？什么，投资？这是你来这儿的目的。

yingyinNormal.en: I have an investment idea. I think is utterly unique to your company. Something avant-garde, yet nostalgic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有一个投资构想，在你的公司绝对独一无二，前卫，又有点怀旧。

yingyinNormal.en: I recognize that man. His name is Bruce Moran. He's an investment advisor and CPA based out of Brooklyn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认识这个人，他叫布鲁斯·莫兰，他是布鲁克林的一个投资顾问兼注册会计师。

yingyinNormal.en: So what kind of investment are we talking about here? Jesus, Steve. I said I was interested, not buying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们谈谈怎么投资吧？天哪，史蒂夫，我说过我只是出于兴趣，但还并不想做买卖。

yingyinNormal.en: Only that, in the entire history of Wall Street, no investment bank has ever failed unless caught in criminal activities.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只能说，华尔街的历史上从未有投资银行倒下，除非那个银行犯了罪。

yingyinNormal.en: Banks then channel the savings into investment in new plants, skills and techniques that let us produce more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样银行就能把储蓄的钱转向投资于新工厂、发展新技术以及提高我们的生产效率。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't do it on our own, you know. The margin on milk is always kind of tight, and in order to build the facility that's needed to capture all this methane and turn it into electricity, it requires a huge capital investment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们靠一己之力是做不了的，牛奶行业的利润总是不怎么高，而且改进设备来获得全部的这些沼气，然后把它们变成电力这是一笔巨大的投资。

yingyinNormal.en: We've seen you with vomit in your hair, making out with investment bankers in the men's room at p.j. clarke's. You don't have to hide anything from us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都见过你头发里有呕吐物的样子，还有你和银行家在餐馆的男厕所鬼混的事，你不必对我们隐瞒任何事。

yingyinNormal.en: I think we need to encourage foreign investment and develop new forms of economic growth rather than make one of the world's poorest countries even poorer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为我们应该鼓励外国资本进入发展新的经济增长模式，而不是让刚果一穷到底。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: Although electric cars are still a rarity on roads now, this massive <highlight>investment</highlight> could change the picture rapidly in coming years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管电动汽车目前在道路上仍然很少见，但这一大规模投资可能会在未来几年迅速改变这一局面。

examination_example.sentence: The link between happiness and <highlight>investment</highlight> generally held even after accounting for these things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使考虑到这些因素，幸福和投资之间的联系仍然存在。

examination_example.sentence: That's because happiness is linked to the kind of longer-term thinking necessary for making <highlight>investments</highlight> for the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是因为幸福与对未来进行投资所必需的那种长期思考有关。

sense_info_list.en: an act of devoting time, effort, or energy to a particular undertaking with the expectation of a worthwhile result

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 投资；包围；封锁；投入；付出；值得投资之物

word_family.mean: v. 投资；赋予；赋有；给…穿衣；包围；围攻；投入；耗费；花钱买；授予

sense_info_list.en: the action or process of investing money for profit or material result

examination_example.sentence: Aydin Municipality bought the plane from a private company for just under US$100,000, but they hope to see a return on that <highlight>investment</highlight> through the tourism industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾丁市以不到十万美元的价格从一家私人公司购买了这架飞机，但他们希望通过旅游业获得投资回报。

examination_example.sentence: A Pearson spokesperson told BuzzFeed News that "digital materials are less expensive and a good <highlight>investment</highlight>" that offer new features, like audio texts, personalized knowledge checks and expert videos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 皮尔森(Pearson)公司的一位发言人对 BuzzFeedNews 说：“数字教材价格较低，是一项很好的投资。”它提供了新功能，例如音频文本，个性化知识检查和专家视频。

examination_example.sentence: Whether adequate <highlight>investment</highlight> is being made to improve airport facilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是否有足够的投资以改善机场设施。

sense_info_list.en: an act of devoting time; effort; or energy to a particular undertaking with the expectation of a worthwhile result

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
